GS39jyopancu:198: etāni gātreṣu vilāsinīnāṃ śrīkhaṇḍatulyaṃ prathayanti gandham //
GS39jyopancu:201: etānīnduyutāni parṇajarasaiḥ piṣṭo 'ṅgarāgaḥ śubhaḥ kāryo gandhakalākalāpakuśalaiḥ kṣoṇīndrayogyaḥ sadā // JPanc_3.14 //
GS39jyopancu:202: pathyā bhāgacatuṣṭayaṃ jalamuco bhāgaikamātraṃ mataṃ vyādherbhāgacatuṣṭayaṃ ca śaśinaṇa sthauṇeyabhāgadvayam
GS39jyopancu:203_0: bhāgāḥ pañca śilodbhavasya kathitā bhāgo nakhasyāpi ca kastūrīdalasañjñakaṃ nigaditaṃ saurabhyavijñairidam pathyābhāgacatuṣṭayaṃ
GS39jyopancu:204: māṃsīpadmatuṣāravālakasamaiḥ samyaktayā peṣitaḥ sarvairebhirihottamaḥ prakathitaḥ saurabhyagarbhābhidhaḥ mukhavāsayogāḥ /
GS39jyopancu:206: sthito mukhāntaḥ puruṣasya rātrau karoti saurabhyasukhaṃ mukhasya //
GS39jyopancu:208: tāmbūlagarbhā divase ca rātrau karoti puṃsāṃ mukhavāsamiṣṭam // JPanc_3.18
GS39jyopancu:209: yaḥ kuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ madhunā ghṛtena pīkākṣabījānvitamatti nityam /
GS39jyopancu:210: māsaikamātreṇa mukhaṃ tadīyaṃ gandhāyate ketakipuṣpatulyam // JPanc_3.19
GS39jyopancu:212: balena nārī paritoṣameti na hīnavīryasya kadā 'pi saukhyam /
GS39jyopancu:213: ato balārthaṃ ratilampaṭasya bījābhivṛddhiṃ prathamaṃ vidadhyāt //
GS39jyopancu:214: cūrṇaṃ vidāryāḥ svarasena tasyāḥ subhāvitaṃ bhāskararaśmijālaiḥ /
GS39jyopancu:215: madhvājyasammiśritamāśu līḍhvā daśa striyo gacchati nirviśaṅkaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:216: bhūyo vibhāvyāmalakasya cūrṇaṃ rasena tasyaiva sitājyamiśram /
GS39jyopancu:217: sakṣaudramāleḍhi niśāmukhe yo nūnaṃ sa vṛddhastaruṇatvameti // JPanc_3.22
GS39jyopancu:219: kṣīreṇa cūrṇāni nipīya rātrau mathnāti darpaṃ taruṇījanasya // JPanc_3.23
GS39jyopancu:221: ghṛtena siddhaṃ saha saindhavena mahābalaḥ syādupabhujya nūnam //
GS39jyopancu:224: sitapikatarubījaṃ taṇḍulāḥ ṣaṣṭikānāṃ saghṛtamadhusametaṃ pratyahaṃ yo
GS39jyopancu:226: jaṭharakuharamadhye yāti yāvanna pākaṃ ramayati kṛśadeho 'pyaṅganānāṃ
GS39jyopancu:228: māṃsīṃ vidārīṃ ca tathoccaṭāṃ ca kṣīre gavāṃ kṣaudraghṛtopapannām /
GS39jyopancu:229: pītvā naraḥ śarkarayā suyuktāṃ kuliṅgavaddhṛṣyati sarvarātram //
GS39jyopancu:231: sarpiṣā payasā pītvā ratau caṭakavadbhavet // JPanc_3.28 //
GS39jyopancu:235: prauḍhāṅganāyā navasūtikāyāḥ ślathaṃ varāṅgaṃ na sukhāya yūnām /

GS39jyopancu:240: liptvā varāṅgaṃ madhukena tulyaṃ vṛddhā 'pi kanyeva bhavatpurandhrī //
GS39jyopancu:241: pikākṣabījena manojagehaṃ vilipya yoṣā niyamaṃ carantī /
GS39jyopancu:242: haṭhena gāḍhaṃ labhate varāṅgaṃ dṛṣṭo naraireṣa sadaiva yogaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:243: yā śakragopaṃ svayameva piṣṭvā vilimpati strī kusumeṣuveśma /
GS39jyopancu:244: āha sma tasyāḥ kaṭhinaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ bhavecca nātrāsti vikalpaśaṅkā //
GS39jyopancu:246: lepena nāryāḥ smaraveśmarandhraṃ saṅkocayatyāśu haṭhena yogaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:247: madanakaghanasāraiḥ kṣaudratulyairvarāṅgaṃ śithilitamapi yasyāḥ pūritaṃ bhūya eva /
GS39jyopancu:248: bhavati kaṭhinamuccaiḥ karkaśaṃ kāminīnām iti nigadati yogaṃ rantidevo narendraḥ // JPanc_3.36
GS39jyopancu:250: yadyapyaṣṭaguṇādhiko nigaditaḥ kāmo 'ṅganānāṃ sadā no yāti dravatāṃ tathā 'pi jhaṭiti vyāyāmināṃ saṅgame /
GS39jyopancu:251: tasmādbheṣajasamprayogavidhinā saṅkṣepato drāvaṇaṃ kiñcitpallavayāmi paṅkajadṛśāṃ pratyāyakaṃ kāminoḥ // JPanc_3.37 //
GS39jyopancu:253: kṣiptāni vai sā puruṣaprasaṅgātprāgeva retaḥsrutimātanoti // JPanc_3.38 //
GS39jyopancu:254: ghoṣārajaḥ kṣaudrasamanvitaṃ tu kṣiptaṃ yadīye smarayantragehe /

GS39jyopancu:257: liptvā dhvajaṃ yo ramate 'ṅganāṃ yāṃ sā śukramāvarṣati śīghrameva //
GS39jyopancu:259: lepena liṅgasya karoti retaḥsrutiṃ vipakṣapramadājanasya // JPanc_3.41 //
GS39jyopancu:261: dravati jhaṭiti liptaṃ bheṣajasyāsya yogād iti vadati narendro rantidevaḥ kavīndraḥ // JPanc_3.42
GS39jyopancu:266: tailena vṛddhiṃ khalu yānti śīghraṃ varāṅgakarṇastanamehanāni //

GS39jyopancu:271: kṣīreṇa bastasya ca baddhamūlaṃ lajjālumūlaṃ svayameva piṣṭvā /

GS39jyopancu:274: karañjabījodaramadhyagāni badhnanti vīryaṃ vadane dhṛtāni // JPanc_3.47 //
GS39jyopancu:276: kumārikākartitasūtrakeṇa baddhaṃ na yātyāśu manojajīram // JPanc_3.48 //
GS39jyopancu:278: kṣaudrena piṣṭvā pariliptanābheḥ stambhaṃ prayātyāśu narasya bījam //
GS39jyopancu:281: kṛtvā lalāṭaphalake tilakaṃ kṛtajño lokatrayaṃ vaśayati kṣaṇamātrakeṇa //
GS39jyopancu:283: devīmahotsavadine kila kajjalaṃ yat siddhārthakasya surasena narottamāṅge
GS39jyopancu:284: niṣpātitaṃ naravareṇa niśi śmaśāne tannetragaṃ bhuvanameva vaśaṃ karoti //
GS39jyopancu:286: kuṣṭhotpalaṃ madhukarasya ca patrayugmaṃ mūlaṃ tathā tagarajaṃ sitakākajaṅghā /
GS39jyopancu:287: yasyāḥ śirogatamidaṃ vihitaṃ tu cūrṇaṃ dāsībhavejjhaṭiti sā taruṇī na citram // JPanc_3.52
GS39jyopancu:289: savyena pāṇikamalena ratāvasāne yo retasā nijabhavena vilāsadakṣaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:290: vāmaṃ vilimpati padaṃ sahasaiva yasyās tasyaiva sā bhavati nātra vikalpabhāvaḥ // JPanc_3.53
GS39jyopancu:291: sambhogaśeṣasamaye nijakāntameḍhraṃ yā kāminī spṛśati vāmapadāmbujena /
GS39jyopancu:292: tasyāḥ patiḥ sapadi vindati dāsabhāvaṃ goṇīsutena kathitaḥ kila yāgarājaḥ
GS39jyopancu:293: sindhūtthamākṣikakapotamalāni piṣṭvā liṅgaṃ vilipya taruṇīṃ ramate naro yaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:294: sā 'nyaṃ prayāti puruṣaṃ na kadā 'pi kāmaṃ dāsībhavedatimanoharadivyamūrtiḥ // JPanc_3.55
GS39jyopancu:295: bhallūkameḍhraghanasāramadhūni piṣṭvā liptadhvajo nidhuvanaṃ vidadhīta yasyāḥ /
GS39jyopancu:296: sā ' 'hlādinī kusumasāyakasannatāṅgī vaśyā bhaveccirataraṃ na hi saṃśayo
GS39jyopancu:299: liptadhvajaḥ pariramatyabalāṃ naro yas tasyāḥ sa eva hṛdaye mukuṭatvameti
GS39jyopancu:301: śṛṅgīvacāyuvatisarjarasaṃ samānaṃ kṛtvā truṭiṃ malayajaṃ ca ṣaḍeva miśram /
GS39jyopancu:302: yo dhūpayennijagṛhaṃ vasanaṃ śarīraṃ tasyāpi dāsa iva mohamupaiti lokaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:304: madamadapadamādau mādayeti dvivāraṃ tadanu ca likhanīyaṃ saukhyadaṃ hrīṃ ca tasmāt /
GS39jyopancu:305: atha ca padamupānte nāmarūpādisañjño bhavati madanamantraḥ svāhayā saṃyuto 'yam // JPanc_3.59
GS39jyopancu:306: 'oṃ mada mada mādaya mādaya hrīṃ amukīṃ vaśamānaya svāhā'

GS39jyopancu:308: iha tu sakalakāryaṃ vāmahastena kāryam upadiśati samāsājjyotirīśaḥ svarūpam // JPanc_3.60
GS39jyopancu:309: asya mantrasya daśasahastrasaṅkhyākonmito japaḥ, raktavarṇaiḥ prasūnairmadhunā ghṛtena ca homaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:313: iti manasi manojaṃ dhyāyayedyo japastho vaśayati sa samastaṃ bhūtalaṃ mantraśaktyā // JPanc_3.61
GS39jyopancu:315: cāmuṇḍe prathamaṃ jayeti kathitaṃ sambodhanaṃ mohaya jñātavyaṃ vaśamānayeti ca padaṃ sādhyaṃ dvitīyāyutam /
GS39jyopancu:316: svāhāntaḥ praṇavādireṣa prathitastantre mahāmohanaḥ sanmantraḥ kaviśekhareṇa kathito nāsmāddvitīyo bhuvi // JPanc_3.62 //
GS39jyopancu:317: 'oṃ cāmuṇḍe jaya cāmuṇḍe mohaya amukīṃ vaśamānaya svāhā' iti mantraḥ /
GS39jyopancu:318: asya mantrasya japa ekalakṣamitaḥ, palāśakusumairhomaḥ daśāṃśaṃ, sarvaṃ vāmahastena kartavyam
GS39jyopancu:320: daṃṣṭrākoṭivisaṅkaṭā suvadanā sāndrāndhakāre sthitā khaṭvāṅgāsinigūḍhadakṣiṇakarā vāme sapāśaṃ śiraḥ /
GS39jyopancu:321: śyāmā piṅgalamūrdhajā bhayakarī śārdūlacarmāmbarā cāmuṇḍā śavavāhinī japavidhau dhyeyā sadā sādhakaiḥ // JPanc_3.63 //
GS39jyopancu:323: oṅkāraḥ prathamaṃ namo nama iti proktaṃ ca tasmātpadaṃ cāmuṇḍe parikīrtitaṃ hili hili jñeyā ca sañjñā tataḥ /
GS39jyopancu:324: jñātavyaṃ tu samānayeti ca padaṃ sanmantriṇāṃ sammato mantro 'yaṃ
GS39jyopancu:325: kaviśekhareṇa kathitaḥ khyātaḥ sadā siddhidaḥ // JPanc_3.64 //
GS39jyopancu:326: 'oṃ namo namaścāmuṇḍe hilī hili amukīṃ vaśamānaya svāhā'
GS39jyopancu:327: asya mantrasya japa ekalakṣaparimitaḥ, taddaśāṃśaḥ palāśakusumairhomaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, sarvaṃ vāmahastena kartavyam //
GS39jyopancu:329: vajrāsaktaśarāsanā trinayanā savyetareṇāṅkuśaṃ vāmenāpi kareṇa pāśamurasi nyastottamāṅgasrajā
GS39jyopancu:330: vyāmuktorukacā karālavadanā vahniprabhā madhyagā dhyeyā jāpavidhau narairiti sadā viśveśvarī siddhaye // JPanc_3.65 //
GS39jyopancu:333: anena mantreṇa madhumiśritajātikusumasahitaṃ tāmbūlamādityadine sahasravāramabhimantritaṃ padminyai dātavyam /
GS39jyopancu:336: 'oṃ paca paca oṃ vihaṅgama vihaṅgama oṃ kāmadevāya svāhā' iti mantraḥ /
GS39jyopancu:340: 'oṃ hara hara oṃ paca paca kāmadevāya svāhā' iti mantraḥ /
GS39jyopancu:341: anena mantreṇa taragamūlaṃ śrīphalañcādityavāre aṣṭottaraśatavāramabhimantritaṃ śaṅkhinyai dātavyam /
GS39jyopancu:344: 'oṃ ciri ciri vaśaṃ kuru kāmadevāya svāhā' iti mantraḥ /

GS39jyopancu:348: kṣīrodanaṃ dvijavarāya purā pradadyāt puṣyoddhṛtaṃ sitabalācaraṇaṃ kumāryā
GS39jyopancu:349: piṣṭaṃ pradattamiti vairakṛtāmanicchāṃ niḥsārayediha muhurviditaprabhāvaḥ // JPanc_3.66
GS39jyopancu:353: vasā bhujaṅgasya hayāripatraṃ kolasya medaḥ samabhāgayuktāḥ /

GS39jyopancu:358: plotena vakṣojayuge pradeyaṃ prayāti vṛddhiṃ patito 'pi nāryāḥ //
GS39jyopancu:361: dhūpena yoniṃ niśi dhūpayitvā nārī pramodaṃ vidadhāti bhartuḥ //
GS39jyopancu:363: abhyaṅgayogena sadaiva yonau saubhāgyamāpnoti rate purandhrī // JPanc_3.72
GS39jyopancu:366: tattailayogena vilāsinīnāṃ naśyanti romāṇi samūlameva // JPanc_3.73 //
GS39jyopancu:368: kandarpagehe mṛgalocanānāṃ romāṇi rohanti kadāpi naiva // JPanc_3.74 //
GS39jyopancu:369: rambhājale saptadinaṃ vibhāvya bhasmeha kambormasṛṇaṃ ca paścāt /

GS39jyopancu:373: gṛhāmbunā pītamidaṃ yuvatyā karoti puṣpaṃ smaramandirasya // JPanc_3.76 //
GS39jyopancu:376: prāpnoti garbhaṃ niyamaṃ carantī vandhyā 'pi nūnaṃ puruṣaprasaṅgāt //
GS39jyopancu:377: puṣyoddhṛtaṃ lākṣmaṇameva mūlaṃ bhartrā nipiṣṭaṃ saghṛtaṃ ca pītam /
GS39jyopancu:378: kṣīraudanaṃ prāśya patiprasaṅgādgarbhaṃ vidhatte taruṇī na citram //
GS39jyopancu:379: yā bījapūradrumamūlamekaṃ kṣīreṇa siddhaṃ haviṣā vimiśram /
GS39jyopancu:380: ṛtau nipīya svapatiṃ prayāti dīrghāyuṣaṃ sā tanayaṃ prasūte // JPanc_3.79
GS39jyopancu:387: uccaiḥśravā turaṅgāṇāṃ mandire nivasantu te // JPanc_3.81 //
GS39jyopancu:388: oṃ idamamamṛtamapāṃ samuddhṛtaṃ vai tava laghu garbhamimaṃ vimuñcatu stri
GS39jyopancu:390: oṃ muktāḥ pāśā vipāśāśca muktāḥ sūryeṇa raśmayaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:391: muktaḥ sarvabhayādgarbha ehyehi mā cira svāhā // JPanc_3.83 //
GS39jyopancu:394: ebhirmantraiḥ saptavāramabhimantritaṃ jalaṃ garbhavatyai pātuṃ dātavyam /
GS39jyopancu:395: “oṃ manmatha manmatha manmathavāhini ! lambodaraṃ muñca muñca laghu svāhā”
GS39jyopancu:397: anena mantreṇa saptavāramabhimantritaṃ jalaṃ garbhavatyai pātuṃ dātavyam /
GS39jyopancu:401: madyena māsārdhadinaṃ nipīya vandhyā bhavenniścitameva nārī // JPanc_3.85
GS39jyopancu:402: phalaṃ kadambasya ca mākṣikaṃ hi tuṣodakena tridinaṃ nipīya /
GS39jyopancu:403: snānāvasāne niyamena cāpi vandhyāmavaśyaṃ kurute haṭhena // JPanc_3.86 //
GS39jyopancu:405: ṛtau nipītaṃ mṛgaśāvakākṣyā vandhyātvametanniyataṃ karoti // JPanc_3.87 //
GS39jyopancu:407: tilaprasūnaṃ saha gokṣureṇa sasāraghaṃ gavyaghṛtena piṣṭam /
GS39jyopancu:409: karṣārdhamātraṃ prasavaṃ phalena nimbasya tailaṃ niyamena pītam /
GS39jyopancu:413: anena yogena sadaiva keśā rohanti kṛṣṇāḥ kuṭilā viśālāḥ // JPanc_3.90 //
GS39jyopancu:417: prakhyāte mahati prabhūtavibhave cāritraśīlānvite vidyādhairyavivekaśauryavibhavaślāghye kulīne kule /
GS39jyopancu:418: kanyā bhrātṛyutā suśīlavinayā rūpojjvalā dakṣiṇā traivargāśritaśuddhavaṃśanilayā sadbhirvivāhyā naraiḥ // JPanc_4.1 //
GS39jyopancu:419: ambhojāsyā bahalanayanā bhūrikeśapracārā tulyā snigdhā susamadaśanā padmarāgādharauṣṭhī /
GS39jyopancu:420: ramyaśrotrā madhuravacanā kambukaṇṭhī śubhāṅgī madhye kṣīṇā sulalitakarā dakṣiṇāvartanābhiḥ pīnaśroṇī kanakakadalīstambhajaṅghābhirāmā raktāśokaprasavacaraṇā snigdhaśākhāṅgulīkā /
GS39jyopancu:421: itthaṃ yuktā sulalitatanurlakṣaṇairuttamairyā kanyā sadbhiścaṭulacaritā sā vivāhyā guṇajñaiḥ atha kanyādūṣaṇasamuddeśaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:422: kharvā piṅgalakuntalā kṛśatanurdīrghā 'tiromākulā kṛṣṇā saukaralocanā pṛthugalā kṛṣṇādharā danturā /
GS39jyopancu:423_0: rukṣāṅgī vikaṭastanī ca sabalā babhrūravīrātmajā vācālā bahubhojanā ca gadinī prauḍhā ca duḥkhānvitā puṣpakṣmādharavṛkṣadeśataṭinīnakṣatrasañjñā
GS39jyopancu:423_1: ca yā hāsye kūpayugaṃ kapolayugale yasyā bhavet satvaram /
GS39jyopancu:424: aṅguṣṭhādhikaparvaṇī caraṇayoryasyāśca jātā 'ṅguliḥ pādasyāpi kanīnikā na
GS39jyopancu:426: ajñātānvayajā svabhāvapiśunā lambādharā cañcalā kuṣṭhiścitrikulodbhavā ca vitatā yasyāḥ kaṭirnāsikā
GS39jyopancu:427: nindyā pallavajihvikā drutagatirnyūnādhikāṅgī punas tyājyā kāmakalākalāpakuśalaiḥ kanyā vivāhe sadā // JPanc_4.6 //
GS39jyopancu:429: prakhyāto 'malavaṃśajo navavayāḥ śūrassuśīlaśca yaḥ svācāraḥ sthirasauhṛdo guṇanidhirnānākuṭumbī balī /
GS39jyopancu:430: arthī bhogarato viśiṣṭavacano dākṣiṇyadhairyāśrayo jāmātā jagatītale kavivarairevaṃvidho varṇitaḥ atha varadūṣaṇasamuddeśaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:431: pāpiṣṭho vyasanī ṛṇairupahato dyūtapriyo bhikṣuko rogī puṃstvavivarjitaścalamatirvaideśikaḥ kātaraḥ /
GS39jyopancu:432: mūrkho duṣṭakulodbhavaśca kṛpaṇo vṛddho 'tidīnaḥ khalaḥ kartavyo na varaḥ kadā 'pi puruṣairevaṃvidho bhūtale // JPanc_4.8 //
GS39jyopancu:434: cāturvarṇyasamāhitā munivarairaṣṭau vivāhāḥ striyo brāhmo daivatakastato nigaditau gāndharvapaiśācakau
GS39jyopancu:436: prājāpatyasamābhidhaḥ pṛthagamī proktā mayā nāmataḥ // JPanc_4.9 //
GS39jyopancu:437: ārṣo daivatakaḥ prajāpatibhavo brāhmo dvijānāṃ mato gāndharvaḥ saha rākṣasena kathitaḥ kṣātrasya tajjñairasau /
GS39jyopancu:438: ekaścāsurasañjñako nigadito vaiśyasya śūdrasya ca saṅkṣepādupavarṇitaṃ kramavaśātpaurāṇikaṃ lakṣaṇam // JPanc_4.10 //
GS39jyopancu:439: vidyāvān guṇapūjitaḥ sucaritaḥ sadvaṃśajāto muniḥ saumyo mānarataḥ suśīlavinayo gehāgataḥ prārthakaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:440: kanyāyā gṛhanāyakaḥ sapulakastasmai dadātyādarād ārṣo goyugadakṣiṇo nigaditastajjñairvivāho varaḥ // JPanc_4.11 //
GS39jyopancu:441: ṛtvigbhiḥ parimaṇḍite bahuvidhe yajñotsave cottame nānāvarṇasuvarṇavastrakusumairābhūṣitāṅgī śubhā /

GS39jyopancu:446: kanyā prītimate varāya vidhinā yaddīyate sādaraṃ brāhmo 'sau
GS39jyopancu:448: kanyā yauvanaśālinī patimamuṃ yā svīkaroti svayaṃ gāndharvaḥ sa hi kathyate bhujabalādākṛṣyate yatpunaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:449: jñeyo rākṣasa eṣa paṇḍitavaraiścauryādvivāho 'paraḥ paiśācaḥ kaviśekhareṇa kathitastyājyaḥ sadā yatnataḥ // JPanc_4.15 //
GS39jyopancu:450: ādāya prathamaṃ varādbahutaraṃ śulkaṃ yathākāṅkṣayā vastrālaṅkṛtivaibhavena tanayāsantoṣamutpādya ca /
GS39jyopancu:451: paścādduṣkulasambhavāya malinaṃ kanyāpradānaṃ vṛthā prakhyāto 'dhamavaṃśajāpariṇayastajjñairasāvāsuraḥ atha paradāratyāgasamuddeśaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:452: aśraddhāmupahasyatāṃ malinatāmarthakṣayaṃ lāghavaṃ garhāṃ glānimadhogatiṃ vikalatāmāyuḥkṣatiṃ durgatim /
GS39jyopancu:453: itthaṃ ye paradārakarmaṇi ratā lokatraye ninditā vindante paramāpadaḥ sukhadhiyā duḥkhaṃ narāste sadā // JPanc_4.17 //
GS39jyopancu:454: paulastyaḥ suradaityamartyamukuṭavyāghṛṣṭapādāmbujo maithilyāharaṇādavāpa maraṇaṃ vāliścyuto rājyataḥ /
GS39jyopancu:455: pāñcālīpratikāṅkṣitvena nidhanaṃ bhīmādgataḥ kīcakas tasmādanyavadhūrnarairna manasā 'pyālāpanīyā bhuvi // JPanc_4.18 //
GS39jyopancu:457: cakṣuḥprītirudīritā prathamataścittabhramaḥ syāttataḥ saṅkalpastadanantaraṃ nigadito nidrāvināśastathā
GS39jyopancu:458: vairāgyaṃ viṣayeṣu kārśyamatha ca vrīḍānivṛttistato hyunmādo maraṇaṃ

GS39jyopancu:462_0: urvaśyā ca purūravā narapatiḥ santyājito jīvitaṃ tasmājjīvitarakṣaṇāya hi vinirgamyā parapreyasī dāsī vāravadhūrnaṭī ca vidhavā
GS39jyopancu:462_1: bālā ca dhātrī tathā kanyā pravrajitā ca bhikṣuvanitā sambandhinī śilpinī /
GS39jyopancu:463: mālākāranitambinī pratisakhī dautye smṛtā yoṣitām ālāpe kavibhiḥ sadaiva madanavyāpāralīlāvidhau atha sukhasādhyāsamuddeśaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:464: prauḍhā kāntavimānitā bahuguṇā ramyā 'napatyā tathā raṇḍā svairaparā

GS39jyopancu:467: ekā vallabharakṣitā parajanālāpe viraktā dṛḍhā niḥsnehā dhanayauvane gurujanādbhītā ca lajjāvatī
GS39jyopancu:468: svasthā sundaranāyakā patiratā śiṣyādikāntā tathā duḥsādhyā kaviśekhareṇa ramaṇī proktā ratiprārthane atha tyājyastrīsamuddeśaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:469: ajñātā dvijavallabhā guruvadhūrmitrāṅganā rogiṇī ceṭī pravrajitā satī ripuvadhūḥ śiṣyā ca garbhānvitā /
GS39jyopancu:470: bhrūṇaghnī mṛtasantatiḥ khalajanā cāspṛśyajā gotrajā gantavyā na kadācideva puruṣairetāḥ striyaḥ kāmibhiḥ // JPanc_4.25 //
GS39jyopancu:472: nadyāṃ devagṛhe catuṣpathavaṭe śailasya sānau jale gurvagnidvijasannidhau paragṛhe durge śmaśāne vane /
GS39jyopancu:473: sandhyāyāṃ divase kadā 'pi surataṃ pumbhirvivekānvitair dṛṣṭvā
GS39jyopancu:475: aṣṭamyāṃ himaraśmiśekharatithau bāṇe ca pūrṇātithau bhānoḥ saṅkramaṇe vrate ca śaradi grīṣme kṣapāyāmapi /
GS39jyopancu:476: yātāyātapariśrame jvaragade sambhogaceṣṭāṃ naraḥ kuryānnaiva kadācideva sukṛtītyāhurmunīndrāḥ sphuṭam // JPanc_4.27 //
GS39jyopancu:478: sphūrjjaddīpaśikhojjvale sulalite ramyonnate vistare dhūpodgāramanohare kusumasragdāmopaśobhānvite

GS39jyopancu:480: uktā gacchati lajjitā viramati premṇā manāgīkṣate keśāṁlluñcati jṛmbhaṇaṃ racayati prastauti gāthāṃ muhuḥ /
GS39jyopancu:481: āliṅgatyaparāṃ virauti paruṣaṃ cumbatyasau bālakaṃ gātraṃ bhañjati jṛmbhate vihasati pratyuttaraṃ yācate // JPanc_4.29 //
GS39jyopancu:482: dormūlaṃ khalu darśayet stanayuge vastraṃ samālambate aṅguṣṭhena likhenmahīṃ smitamukhī vrīḍāṃ vidhatte mṛṣā /
GS39jyopancu:483: dantenādharapallavaṃ vidaśati vyaktaṃ tathā bhāṣate bhāvairebhiriha sphuṭaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ jñeyo 'bhilāṣaḥ sadā // JPanc_4.30 //
GS39jyopancu:486: sphūrjjaddīpamanojñavāsabhavane śayyātale nāyako rāgārthaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ prathamataḥ kuryātsamaṃ yoṣitā // JPanc_4.31 //
GS39jyopancu:488: jñātavyaṃ tilataṇḍulaṃ rasavidāmāliṅganaṃ yoṣitāṃ kṣīraṃ nīrapuraḥsaraṃ nigaditaṃ tasmācca lālāṭikam // JPanc_4.32 //
GS39jyopancu:489: ekena pādena padaṃ svabharturanyena cākramya tadūrubhāgam /

GS39jyopancu:492: nārī priyaṃ cumbati nistaraṅgā bhavellatāveṣṭitasañjñakaṃ tat //
GS39jyopancu:494: vaktrāsavaṃ svādayati prahṛṣṭā tajjñaiḥ sphuṭaṃ jāghanametaduktam //
GS39jyopancu:503: anyonyasaṃsaktamukhaṃ ca bāhū netraṃ lalāṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ kapolam /
GS39jyopancu:507: āliṅganānantarameva yūnoḥ sthānāni cumbasya vadanti tajjñāḥ // JPanc_4.41
GS39jyopancu:508: kakṣāyugaṃ cāpi nitambinīnāṃ kandarpagehaṃ ca ratipravīṇāḥ /
GS39jyopancu:509: cumbanti kāmaṃ taralāyatākṣyā deśasya sātmyena sadaiva lāṭāḥ // JPanc_4.42
GS39jyopancu:510: kānto 'ṅganāyā vadane svakīyaṃ vaktraṃ samāropya balena yatra /
GS39jyopancu:511: na cumbati krodhavaśena nārī syāccumbanaṃ tannimitābhidānam // JPanc_4.43
GS39jyopancu:512: patyurmukhe svīyamukhaṃ niveśya premṇā manāgañcati dantavāsaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:513: uccena gṛhṇātyapi kampitoṣṭhī proktaṃ munīndraiḥ sphuritaṃ vinodāt //
GS39jyopancu:514: hastena netraṃ parimīlya bhartuḥ sammīlitākṣī vadane svajihvām /
GS39jyopancu:515: nikṣipya ca krīḍati yatra lolā khyātaṃ rasajñaiḥ khalu ghṛṣṭasañjñam //
GS39jyopancu:518: kāntādharaṃ svādharasampuṭena pītvā muhuḥ svādayati krameṇa /
GS39jyopancu:519: nārī ca tenaiva vidhānakena jñeyaṃ munīndrairiti sampuṭākhyam //
GS39jyopancu:520: oṣṭhena kāntoṣṭhayugaṃ nipīya jihvāṃ nidhāyāpyatha tālubhāge /
GS39jyopancu:521: cumbotsave nṛtyati yatra nārī proktaṃ samauṣṭhaṃ munibhiḥ purāṇaiḥ //
GS39jyopancu:539: deśāntaraṃ gacchati kāminīnāṃ saṃsmārakaṃ dardurakaṃ vadanti // JPanc_4.56
GS39jyopancu:540: puṃsaḥ śarīre yuvatīkuce vā kṣataṃ nakhasya prativīkṣya sadyaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:542: sarvasvamevāsti manobhavasya premṇā prayuktaṃ karajaṃ ratajñaiḥ /
GS39jyopancu:545: dantaprakārāśca nakhaprakārairjñeyāḥ samā eva samaiśca sadbhiḥ /
GS39jyopancu:546: śītkārahuṅkāraviceṣṭitādyāḥ prāyo viśeṣāḥ punaratra kāryāḥ // JPanc_4.59
GS39jyopancu:548: dantā pradeyā nakhadānadeśe vaktrāntarākṣidvitayaṃ vihāya // JPanc_4.60 //

GS39jyopancu:553: dīrghā suraktā kṣatakuñcitā ca rekhā sthale cūcukayoḥ pradeyā /

GS39jyopancu:556: dvābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ śirasi prakāmaṃ kṛṣṭvā kacāṃścumbanti vallabhaścet /
GS39jyopancu:557: tadeva diṣṭaṃ samahastasañjñaṃ syādekahastena taraṅgaraṅgaḥ // JPanc_4.64
GS39jyopancu:558: karṇapradeśe ca kacaṃ nipīḍya premṇā patiścumbati vallabhāsyam /

GS39jyopancu:562: bhavyā ghanā raukṣyavivarjitāśca śyāmā viśālā bahulāḥ kacāḥ syuḥ /
GS39jyopancu:565: anye 'pi ye santi bahuprabhedā noktā mayā vistarabhītitaste // JPanc_4.68
GS39jyopancu:570: samīraṇā cāndramasī ca gaurī viśeṣamāsāmupavarṇayāmi // JPanc_5.1 //
GS39jyopancu:572: tasyā mukhe yatpatitaṃ nṛvīryaṃ tanniṣphalaṃ syāditi candramauliḥ //
GS39jyopancu:573: yā cāparā cāndramasī ca nāḍī kandarpagehe bhavati pradhānā /
GS39jyopancu:574: sā sundarī yoṣitameva sūte sādhyā bhavedalparatotsavena // JPanc_5.3 //
GS39jyopancu:575: gaurīti nāḍī yadupasthadeśe pradhānabhūtā bhavati svabhāvāt /
GS39jyopancu:576: putraṃ prasūte bahudhā 'ṅganā sā kaṣṭopabhogyā surate pradiṣṭā //
GS39jyopancu:580: tasyā yuvatyāḥ prakṛtiṃ ca sattvaṃ deśaṃ ca bhāvaṃ madanātapatram /
GS39jyopancu:581: ālokya bandhāḥ parikalpanīyāḥ sambhogakāle puruṣai rasajñaiḥ // JPanc_5.6
GS39jyopancu:584: uttānasuptā yuvatiḥ svapādau skandhe samāropya ramennarasya /
GS39jyopancu:586: evaṃvidhāyāḥ striya eva jaṅghāṃ kāntaḥ svajaṅghopari sanniveśya /
GS39jyopancu:587: udbhramya bhūyaḥ kaṭimāramantyāḥ syādeṣa bandhaḥ kila nāgarākhyaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:588: dhṛtvā svajānuṃ gagane svapādau śayyātale strī prathamaṃ prasuptā /
GS39jyopancu:589: kucau patiḥ pāṇiyugena dhṛtvā ramettadā vyomapadābhidhānam // JPanc_5.10
GS39jyopancu:590: ekaṃ yuvatyāścaraṇaṃ pṛthivyāmūrdhvaṃ tathā 'nyaṃ parikalya kāntaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:591: padbhyāṃ sthito hastayugaṃ ca bhūmau traivikramaḥ syāditi vandharājaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:592: nitambabimbaṃ kila nāyakena nāryāstrikaṃ hastayugena dhṛtvā /
GS39jyopancu:593: gulphau nidhāya sthita eva tasyā bandho 'pyasau cāṭukakelikaḥ syāt //
GS39jyopancu:594: kāntasya vakṣaḥsthalagau ca (sva)pādāv āliṅgya gāḍhaṃ pramadā karābhyām /
GS39jyopancu:597: ekaṃ yuvatyā hṛdaye svapādaṃ tathā 'rpitaṃ talpagataṃ tadanyam /
GS39jyopancu:599: ūrvoḥ patirmadhyagato yuvatyāḥ pārśvasthitāyāḥ parirabhya deham /
GS39jyopancu:604: padmāsanaṃ samparikalpya bhartā kroḍopaviṣṭāṃ yuvatiṃ ramecca /
GS39jyopancu:606: kānto nitambasthita eva nāryāḥ śroṇīṃ karābhyāṃ yadi yāti dhṛtvā /
GS39jyopancu:610: bhartā parikrīḍati bhāvahīno nirdiśyate hāriṇabandha eṣaḥ // JPanc_5.19 //
GS39jyopancu:615: niṣpīḍya nārī patimūrdhvasaṃsthaṃ ramettadā vyāttakaraṃ vadanti //
GS39jyopancu:616: eko yuvatyā yadi kāntahaste jānu sthitaḥ syādaparaḥ pṛthivyām /
GS39jyopancu:617: kāntaṃ karābhyāmupagūhya yatsyājjñeyaṃ rasajñaiḥ karaṇaṃ tripādam //
GS39jyopancu:619: adhomukhī kāntahṛdi prasuptā dorbhyāṃ samāliṅgya yadi prayāti /
GS39jyopancu:620: gā(prau)ḍhāṅganāvallabha eṣa tajjñaiḥ bandhaḥ pradiṣṭo viparītarūpaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:621: dhūrta ! tvamevaṃ vijito 'syakasmādyuddhe mayā pañcaśarasya nārī /
GS39jyopancu:622: ityādikaṃ bhūrividhaṃ raṭantī prāyaḥ sukhaṃ vindati keliraṅge //
GS39jyopancu:625: kṣīṇā navoḍhā jvaritā ca nārī varjyā ratijñairviparītabandhe // JPanc_5.25
GS39jyopancu:629: yadyaṅganā kāntahṛdi prahāraṃ muṣṭyā bhajantī suratopacāraiḥ /

GS39jyopancu:632: yaḥ kevalāṅguṣṭhabhavo 'bhighātaḥ proktaḥ kavīndraiḥ sa tu bindumālaḥ //
GS39jyopancu:633: dravati yadi na nārī prauḍharāgārtiyuktā mṛdunidhuvanayoge dantasandhau salīlam /
GS39jyopancu:634: pibati daśanavāsaḥ kiñcidunmucya bhūyaḥ kathitamiha rasajñaiḥ sītkṛtaṃ rāgakāri // JPanc_5.29
GS39jyopancu:639: jātānurāgau rahasi prakāmaṃ saukhyaṃ samāsvādayato mahīyaḥ // JPanc_5.31

GS39jyopancu:642: syātsundarī sakalasaukhyakalānidhānā svādhīnapūrvapatiketi vadanti tajjñāḥ // JPanc_5.32

GS39jyopancu:646: talpaṃ gatā ruciravāsagṛhe 'vaśete sā kīrtitā jagati vāsakasajjiteti //
GS39jyopancu:647: krodhātprayāti caraṇe patito 'pi kāntaḥ prāyaḥ pracaṇḍavacanāccaraṇairnirastaḥ /
GS39jyopancu:649: saṅketakaṃ priyatamaḥ svayameva dattvā naivāgataḥ samucite samaye ca yasyāḥ /
GS39jyopancu:650: hṛṣṭā vaco 'mṛtarasaiḥ sakalāṅgayaṣṭiḥ sā varṇitā kavivarairiha vipralabdhā // JPanc_5.36
GS39jyopancu:652: yasyāḥ prayātyabhimukhaṃ muhuśo yuvatyāḥ sā khaṇḍiteti kathitā kavibhiḥ purāṇaiḥ // JPanc_5.37
GS39jyopancu:653: ārambhabhagnacaritā vikalā ca nārī yā nirmitā hi madanena madena yāti /

GS39jyopancu:655: deśāntaraṃ prativasadramaṇaśca yasyā dattvā 'vadhiṃ cirataraṃ gurukāryayogāt /
GS39jyopancu:656: durvāraduḥkhadahanaiḥ paridevitāṅgī sā proṣitapriyatamā kathitā munīndraiḥ
GS39jyopancu:658: yāvaccandrakalākirīṭahṛdaye śailādhirājātmajā yāvadvakṣasi mādhavasya kamalā sānandamādīvyati
